name: 'Knuckles' Malone
traits: Broken nose, cauliflower ears, wears a flat cap pulled low over his eyes.
motivation: Loyalty to his boss and a simple desire for respect through fear.
secret: He is pathologically terrified of the dark and sleeps with a nightlight. This stems from a childhood incident where he was locked in a cellar and heard something scratching on the other side of the door.
hook: He is sent to intimidate the investigators, or they witness him shaking down a local shopkeeper.
